Sebastián RIFFO

Former postdoctoral fellow
at Géoazur CNRS

Publications

    SIAM J. Appl. Math., 81(6), pp. 2596–2621, 2021 (Available in HAL)

  • S. Riffo. Mathematical methods for marine energy extraction.
    PhD Dissertation, Université Paris Dauphine-PSL, 2019 (Manuscript) (Thesis defense)

In progress

    Submitted to Geophysics (arXiv preprint)
